text: Clupeidae is a family of teleost fish. It includes the herrings, shads, sardines, hilsa and menhadens. The family includes some of the most important food fishes in the world. == Genera == This family comprises the following 7 genera: * Clupea * Ethmidium * Gudusia * Hyperlophus * Potamalosa * Ramnogaster * Sprattus == References == # Froese, Rainer, and Daniel Pauly, eds. (2023). "Clupeidae" in FishBase. July 2023 version. Category:Clupeiformes
title: Clupeidae
